author: Brandon Evans
comment: Please add a way to send heart beats from the heart sensor on android wear

author: Chris Eckeard
comment: My GF and use this back and forth to let each other know we are thinking about them. Though I might miss a text, I always feel my Android Wear watch pulse to what my GF has sent.

reply.author: NCave LLC
reply.content: Thanks for your feedback!  I'm glad this can bring some smiles to a couple :D

title: Fun app.

author: Wesley Patrick
comment: Updated my review. Sorry it took me so long! I haven't been able to test it and all since I haven't wore my moto 360 in forever (work doesn't allow watches since we work in food) but if you say you added the functionality then I believe you! 5 stars!

reply.author: NCave LLC
reply.content: You asked for it, you got it!  Your girlfriend should be able to download and enjoy Love Taps on her Galaxy S3.  Enjoy!  Have I earned those 3 stars yet? ;)

title: Awesome developers!

author: Judah Mahay
comment: Now we just need the ability to send your heartbeat with your Android Wear watch.

reply.author: NCave LLC
reply.content: Done! This was rolled out a while ago actually, hope you enjoy!

title: Needs Heartbeat Option

author: neil macmillan
comment: My wife and I both have this on our phones, it's a really neat way to keep in touch while we're away during the day. (sappy I know)  I have the moto 360 watch and I feel the taps on my wrist just as she sent them. Very cool :)
title: really cool!

author: Benjamin Pelletier
comment: The interface is very simple and clean, and the idea is more personal than a text message.  It's nice to be able to communicate even when you don't have anything to say.
title: Cute app for couples

author: Nate N
comment: Could you add a developer and beta tester page on google plus if you don't have one already?

reply.author: NCave LLC
reply.content: Thanks for the feedback, Nate.  The fix is rolling out now, it should be available in a few hours.  Please email me at neil@ncavesoft.com if you have any other problems.  I hope to earn those last two stars from you!

title: Looking forward to more updates!
